page.title: 17CANWICK TREATMENT WORKS
page.content: THE AVERAGE DAILY FLOW RECIEVED AT THE WORKS IS{233 LITRES PER SECOND.} (DRY WEATHER FLOW 200 LITRES PER SECOND),FROM A POPULATION OF APPROX 80,000.CANWICK TERMINAL PUMPING STATION SERVES THE CITY OF LINCOLN. DESIGNED FOR THE PERIOD UP TO 2005 AD. POPULATION IN 1980 WAS APPROX.76,000 2005 ESTIMATED AT 100,000.PUMPS:FOUL SEWERAGE PUMPS:FOUL PUMP NET COST APPROX Â£20,000 EACH.STORM PUMP COST APPROX. STORM WATER HOLDING TANKS TOTAL STORAGE CAPACITY{4000 m3}27.5 m DIAMETER 3.5 m DEEP.TO FILL TANK MAX TIME 1\ HOURS WITH 1 PUMP DELIVERY AND 3/4 HOUR AT MAX PUMPING RATE.
